message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this valuable product. Given its potential, I believe a starting price of $1,400,000 is fair. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe it's a bit high at $1,400,000
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your perspective on the price, I believe the value of this product is closer to my initial offer.  Would you consider $1,300,000?
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $1,200,000 is a fair price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $1,250,000. Can we meet at this price?
